author: Staff Reporter
text:
P. Esakkimuthu (45), a fisherman of Madhavan Nair Colony, Threspuram allegedly died of cardiac failure on Saturday while he was engaged in fishing.

He suffered cardiac arrest at seven nautical miles east of Threspuram coast, Inspector of Police, Coastal Security Group, Thoothukudi, C. Muhesh Jeyakumar, said after investigation.

Esakkimuthu, along with five others, ventured into sea for fishing on February 2 and scheduled to return shore on February 7, he said. He died in the boat. Based on a complaint lodged by P. Muniyasami (35), Threspuram, Tharuvaikulam Marine police have filed a case.
title: Fisherman dies of cardiac failure
